sect1.title: Beyond the Book
sect1.para: The repository allows for even more possibilities: automatically building the system described in a book, adding packages to a build, and adding your own book.

sect2.title: Automatic Build
sect2.para:
The same makefile that generates the book can also be used to automatically build a system.
It's as easy as this:
$ git clone git://github.com/kanj/elfs
$ cd BOOK
$ make armMusl-build
Over the next several hours a complete system will be built in the ../sysBuild/clfs_armMusl
Caution: The posted version of the book may reflect as yet uncommited changes.
